SEARCH
Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.effects

Class BaseEffects

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.effects.BaseEffects
Direct Known Subclasses:
FoodComa, GottaGoFast, Overmine, SecondWind, YoureTooSlow
public abstract class BaseEffects extends BaseEvent
Abstract base class for managing potion effects in the EventHorizon plugin. Handles the application and removal of potion effects to players.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • random

      protected final Random random
      Random number generator for effect-related operations

    • key

      protected final org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key
      Unique identifier key for tracking affected players

    • effects

      protected List<org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect> effects
      List of potion effects to be applied by this effect event. Contains all PotionEffect instances that will be applied to players.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseEffects

      public BaseEffects(EventClassification classification, String eventName)
      Constructs a BaseEffects instance with the specified classification and event name. Creates a namespaced key using the event name for tracking affected players.
      Parameters:
      classification - the classification of the event (POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL)
      eventName - unique identifier for this event

    • BaseEffects

      public BaseEffects(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType, String eventName)
      Constructs a BaseEffects instance with a single potion effect and neutral classification. Creates a namespaced key for tracking and adds the specified effect with default parameters.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of potion effect to apply
      eventName - unique identifier for this event

    • BaseEffects

      public BaseEffects(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType, EventClassification classification, String eventName)
      Constructs a BaseEffects instance with a single potion effect and specified classification. Creates a namespaced key for tracking and adds the specified effect with default parameters.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of potion effect to apply
      classification - the classification of the event (POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL)
      eventName - unique identifier for this event

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes this effect event by applying potion effects to all online players. Logs the execution status.
      Specified by:
      execute in class BaseEvent

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminates this effect event by removing potion effects from all affected players. Logs the termination status.
      Specified by:
      terminate in class BaseEvent

    • applyPotionEffectsToAllPlayers

      public void applyPotionEffectsToAllPlayers()
      Applies all registered potion effects to all online players. Logs the success rate of effect application.

    • applyPotionEffectsToPlayer

      public void applyPotionEffectsToPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Applies all registered potion effects to a specific player. Marks the player as affected by this effect event.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to receive the effects

    • removePotionEffectsFromAllPlayers

      public void removePotionEffectsFromAllPlayers()
      Removes all registered potion effects from all online players. Logs the success rate of effect removal.

    • removePotionEffectsFromPlayer

      public void removePotionEffectsFromPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes all registered potion effects from a specific player. Unmarks the player from this effect event.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to remove effects from

    • addEffect

      public BaseEffects addEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType, int duration, int amplifier, boolean ambient, boolean showParticles, boolean showIcon)
      Adds a new potion effect with specified parameters to this effect event.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of potion effect
      duration - effect duration in ticks
      amplifier - effect strength level
      ambient - whether the effect is ambient
      showParticles - whether to show effect particles
      showIcon - whether to show the effect icon
      Returns:
      this BaseEffects instance for method chaining

    • addEffect

      public BaseEffects addEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType)
      Adds a new potion effect with default parameters.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of potion effect to add
      Returns:
      this BaseEffects instance for method chaining

    • addEffect

      public BaseEffects addEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect effect)
      Adds a pre-configured potion effect to this effect event.
      Parameters:
      effect - the PotionEffect to add
      Returns:
      this BaseEffects instance for method chaining

    • removeEffect

      public BaseEffects removeEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType)
      Removes a specific type of potion effect from this effect event.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of effect to remove
      Returns:
      this BaseEffects instance for method chaining

    • getEffect

      public org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect getEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType)
      Retrieves a specific potion effect from this effect event.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of effect to retrieve
      Returns:
      the PotionEffect if found, null otherwise

    • hasEffect

      public boolean hasEffect(org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType effectType)
      Checks if this effect event contains a specific type of potion effect.
      Parameters:
      effectType - the type of effect to check for
      Returns:
      true if the effect exists, false otherwise

    • markEffectPlayer

      public void markEffectPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Marks a player as affected by this effect event using persistent data.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to mark

    • isEffectPlayerMarked

      public boolean isEffectPlayerMarked(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Checks if a player is marked as affected by this effect event.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is marked, false otherwise

    • unmarkEffectPlayer

      public void unmarkEffectPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Removes the effect event marker from a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to unmark

    • removeEffectsFromAllMarkedPlayers

      public void removeEffectsFromAllMarkedPlayers()
      Removes all effects from players who are marked as affected by this event.

    • getAllEffects

      public List<org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect> getAllEffects()
      Gets a copy of all potion effects registered in this effect event.
      Returns:
      a new list containing all registered PotionEffects
